content.description: This route info was gleaned from rockclimbing.comhttps://www.rockclimbing.com/routes/North_America/United_States/Pennsylvania/Southeastern_Region/Safe_Harbor/Cemetary_Wall/Upward_Mobility_375.htmlAnyone know anything about this speak up.A dicey overhung face with loose rock and pumpy moves. The cold shuts are no longer there and you need to pull a hairy move 10 feet after the last bolt to get over the bulge of the climb. The fall factor is very serious so use extreme caution.

climbs.name: Tonus Bonus
climbs.fa: Eric Hörst, Lisa Hörst, Bob Perna

content.description: climb three bolts to top of cliff and move slightly right to 4th bolt then up to anchors.

This route info was gleaned from rockclimbing.com.https://www.rockclimbing.com/routes/North_America/United_States/Pennsylvania/Southeastern_Region/Safe_Harbor/Cemetary_Wall/late_for_work_90976.htmlIf anyone knows more about this route speak up.Very large ledge underneath a roof over half way up (belay st.). it can be led in a single pitch with a 60m but its pretty sketchy. Top out in the v-notch cut out of the roof on the left side.
content.location: Start at small under-hang on the far right of the sport routes.

content.description: Start below right facing corner and short crack. At top of crack move left to next bolt and then continue straight up to anchors.
content.location: Left most of three routes on this small cliff

content.description: Climb North west facing wall to slab and anchors.   the route is in need of cleaning and hardware upgrade.
content.protection: 3 very old bolts and cold shuts

climbs.name: Beat Crazy
climbs.fa: Dixie Marich, Bob Perna, Lisa Hörst, Eric Hörst

content.description: Climb up pinches and liebacks to stance.   Move up over small bulge/roof and then slightly left over last bolt and then up to anchors.
This small cliff just south of the larger Cemetery Wall has 3 climbs.   Walk 50' south of chutes and ladders. There is a small wall with three routes.
